Requirements You're wielding a two-handed melee weapon.

You swipe your weapon in a wide swing to create a deadly arc. Your weapon gains the area (burst 5 feet) and unwieldy traits until the end of the turn. If your weapon has reach, the burst radius becomes the reach of your weapon. @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Area Fire] with the required weapon, centering the burst on a corner of a square you occupy. You're excluded from the burst. If you're using a weapon with the backswing or sweep trait, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the save DC of the attack. If you have the primary target class feature, the primary target Strike you make is a melee Strike, rather than a ranged Strike.
